name: fabric-put
title: Put
description: This activity stores data to fabric ledger
author: Yueming Xu

settings.name: compositeKeys
settings.description: composite keys and attributes as object map[string][]string, e.g. {index1: [attr1,attr2]} (Note: if state key does not match the value of the last attribute of an index, the state-key will be appended to the end of the index)

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: state key of the record to update on the ledger

inputs.name: data
inputs.description: serialized JSON string of the record to update

inputs.name: privateCollection
inputs.description: name of private collection, or blank if not private data

outputs.name: message
outputs.description: serialized result string from the ledger, or error message

outputs.name: key
outputs.description: state key of the returned record

outputs.name: result
outputs.description: the parsed JSON object corresponding to the record from ledger
